item.description:
Summer in Salem means it is time to visit The Willows!

We'll meet at 6:30 outside of the arcade/casino and then grab something to eat. Then we can hit the games, and then the ice cream stands.

It should be comparatively quiet on a Tuesday night, so we won't have to worry about the crowds.

For anyone who has not visited before, you are in for a treat—there is everything from pinball, skeeball, and Tetris to the latest in virtual games. And don't forget the mini golf—it's actually a decent course despite its size.

And if you can't make it at 6:30, don't worry! Just come later and join us for games or a snack.

 

Here's their website; it doesn't cover everything. You need to see it for yourself!

http://www.salemwillowspark.com/index.html

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Willows Night
